Attacks.Name: Bite
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target gains the Bleed special condition.

Attacks.Name: Super Fang
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals damage equal to half the target character's remaining Stamina, rounded up.

Attacks.Name: Scary Face
Attacks.Effect: Choose an enemy character within Range 3. That character's Movement is reduced to S until the end of its next activation.

Superpowers.Name: Hustle
Superpowers.Effect: This character adds 1 die to its attack rolls but subtracts 1 die from its defense rolls.

Superpowers.Name: Hyper Focus
Superpowers.Effect: For the next attack action made by this character this turn, add two dice to its attack roll.

Attacks.Name: Double-Edge
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character suffers 2 damage.

Superpowers.Name: Hustle
Superpowers.Effect: This character adds 1 die to its attack rolls but subtracts 1 die from its defense rolls.
